item.title: Abandoned Road Sign, 17th October
item.description:

item.title: Fly-tipping, 17th October
item.description:
Extreme fly-tipping incident that occurred over two weeks ago. The council are aware but the area remains dangerous, a fire risk and is now attracting vermin. Needs to be cleared urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Forest Hill, London

item.title: Weeding mess left on roadside, 17th October
item.description:
Mount Pleasant Road appears to have been weeded but coupled with the mess the refuse collectors left yesterday and the unswept weeding debris’s everywhere, and left in piles in the road verges..the street looks a mess. This will get worse as parking messes up…or if it starts raining will be clogging the drains! Please complete and finish the job! Lewisham Streets are a disgrace as it is…so having the Local Authority Services adding to the issue is not acceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Mount Pleasant Road, Hither Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
